Description: Imagine never having to use a keyboard to find a local business.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Seattle Area, West Coast, Western US
Full Description: Imagine never having to use a keyboard to find a local business.  Instead, let  simple universal icons guide you through a series of categories until you find that perfect vendor for your needs.  VizLinQ is that all visual paradigm shift;  it vastly facilitates consumers of all backgrounds:  the elderly,  non-native English speakers, and even the spelling challenged.   VizLinQ is a freemium business model.  Licensed local businesses can sign up for FREE and publish basic information, which currently includes: full screen display high-definition pictures, special promotions, external website and social media links, business location, contact information, and general hours of operation. Businesses and contractors are ranked in their respective categories, from the top of the page, using both a listing completion and popularity metric. Put another way, the more visually appealing and complete listings tend to get clicked more often, and therefore rise to the top of the page. This ensures all local contractors and vendors have a fair opportunity to compete for business, while continuously enhancing the end user and customer experience. VizLinQ's platform is built with scalability from the ground up, utilizing high performance NOSQL datastore along with well known web servers.  The platform can scale to user demand as their subscriber base grows.  In addition, large files and images are stored on the cloud to ensure quick and optimal end user experience.
